channel.title: BUhealthAndWellness
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why It's Harder For Women To Look Toned Than Men (But Not Impossible)
item.description: And how to improve your body composition.

item.title: A Nutritional Psychiatrist & A Chef Agree: This Is The Most Underrated Ingredient
item.description: Saving your lemon peel has benefits beyond waste reduction.

item.title: Daytime TV's Sherri Shepherd Navigates Perimenopause With Humor and Positivity
item.description: The road to menopause hasn't always been clearly defined for the stand-up comedian. But now, with open and honest dialogue, she's normalizing a new se...

item.title: Want To Upgrade Your Health Right Now? 7 Easy Tips From Mayo Clinic Diet Experts
item.description: Use these tips to revamp your healthy habits this spring.

item.title: Exactly When To Get Important Health Exams, Based On Your Age
item.description: Because practicing preventive care is so important.

item.title: How To Cook Perfect, Slime-Free Okra: 3 Tricks, From An RD
item.description: If you aren't a fan of its slimy texture, try these methods to keep your okra crunchy.
